metadata.name: swapback_router
metadata.description: Programme de routage de swap avanc√© avec oracle et TWAP

instructions.name: accept_authority
docs: Accept authority transfer (two-step transfer for security)
Step 2: Pending authority accepts the transfer

accounts.name: new_authority
docs: The new authority accepting the transfer

instructions.name: cancel_authority_transfer
docs: Cancel a pending authority transfer

instructions.name: cancel_dca_plan
docs: Cancel and close a DCA plan

instructions.name: claim_rewards
docs: Claim accumulated rebates
Transfers unclaimed USDC rebates from vault to user

accounts.name: user_usdc_account
docs: User's USDC token account to receive rebates

accounts.name: rebate_vault
docs: Rebate vault PDA holding USDC for rebates

instructions.name: create_dca_plan
docs: Create a new DCA plan

instructions.name: emergency_withdraw
docs: Emergency withdraw from rebate vault (for stuck funds recovery)
Only callable by authority when protocol is paused

accounts.name: rebate_vault
docs: Rebate vault to withdraw from

accounts.name: destination
docs: Destination token account for withdrawn funds

instructions.name: execute_dca_swap
docs: Execute a single swap in a DCA plan
This instruction executes a scheduled DCA swap via Jupiter CPI.
The keeper builds the Jupiter instruction off-chain and passes it
along with remaining accounts for the swap.

accounts.name: user_token_in
docs: User's input token account (source)

accounts.name: user_token_out
docs: User's output token account (destination)

accounts.name: executor
docs: Executor that calls this instruction (can be bot or user)

instructions.name: pause_dca_plan
docs: Pause a DCA plan

instructions.name: pause_protocol
docs: Pause the protocol (circuit breaker for emergencies)
Only callable by authority

instructions.name: propose_authority
docs: Propose a new authority (two-step transfer for security)
Step 1: Current authority proposes new authority

instructions.name: resume_dca_plan
docs: Resume a paused DCA plan

accounts.name: user_token_account_a
docs: User's token account A - with ownership validation (H1 FIX)

accounts.name: user_token_account_b
docs: User's token account B - with ownership validation (H1 FIX)

accounts.name: rebate_vault
docs: Rebate vault PDA holding USDC

instructions.name: unpause_protocol
docs: Unpause the protocol
Only callable by authority

instructions.name: update_wallets
docs: Update wallet addresses (treasury, buyback, boost vault)

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Amount per swap must be greater than 0

errors.name: InvalidSwapCount
errors.msg: Total swaps must be greater than 0

errors.name: InvalidExpiry
errors.msg: Expiry must be in the future

errors.name: IdenticalMints
errors.msg: Input and output mints must differ

errors.name: InvalidMinOutput
errors.msg: Minimum output must be greater than 0

errors.name: MissingJupiterRoute
errors.msg: Missing Jupiter route / instruction data for CPI swap

errors.name: JupiterSpentTooHigh
errors.msg: Jupiter CPI: spent input too high vs expected

errors.name: TooManyVenues
errors.msg: Too many venues for one swap (compute guard)

errors.name: NotPendingAuthority
errors.msg: Caller is not the pending authority

errors.name: EmergencyWithdrawExceedsBalance
errors.msg: Emergency withdraw amount exceeds vault balance

errors.name: AlreadyPausedProtocol
errors.msg: Cannot pause an already paused protocol

errors.name: AlreadyUnpausedProtocol
errors.msg: Cannot unpause an already active protocol

types.name: DcaPlan
docs: DCA Plan Account - Manages Dollar Cost Averaging orders
This account stores all information needed for automated DCA execution:
- Token pair (input/output)
- Amount per swap
- Execution frequency (interval in seconds)
- Total number of swaps and progress tracking
- Pause/Resume capability

fields.name: plan_id
docs: Unique identifier for this plan (32 bytes for flexibility)

fields.name: user
docs: User who owns this DCA plan

fields.name: token_in
docs: Input token mint (token being sold)

fields.name: token_out
docs: Output token mint (token being bought)

fields.name: amount_per_swap
docs: Amount of input token per swap (in lamports/smallest unit)

fields.name: total_swaps
docs: Total number of swaps to execute

fields.name: executed_swaps
docs: Number of swaps already executed

fields.name: interval_seconds
docs: Interval between swaps in seconds

fields.name: next_execution
docs: Unix timestamp of next scheduled execution

fields.name: min_out_per_swap
docs: Minimum amount of output token per swap (slippage protection)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Unix timestamp when plan was created

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix timestamp when plan expires (optional, 0 = no expiry)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether the plan is active (can be paused by user)

fields.name: total_invested
docs: Total amount invested so far (tracking)

fields.name: total_received
docs: Total amount received so far (tracking)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: ExecuteDcaSwapArgs
docs: Arguments for DCA swap execution

fields.name: jupiter_instruction
docs: Jupiter swap instruction data (built off-chain by keeper)

fields.name: expected_input
docs: Expected input amount (must match plan's amount_per_swap)

fields.name: amount_received
docs: Actual amount received from Jupiter (reported by keeper after simulation)

types.name: JitoBundleConfig
docs: Jito MEV bundle configuration for sandwich attack protection

fields.name: enabled
docs: Whether to use Jito bundle (private mempool)

fields.name: tip_lamports
docs: Tip amount in lamports (clamped to MIN/MAX)

fields.name: tip_account_index
docs: Selected tip account index (0-7)

types.name: JitoBundleConfigured
docs: Emitted when Jito MEV protection is configured

fields.name: swap_instruction
docs: Full Jupiter instruction data (including discriminator)

fields.name: expected_input_amount
docs: Amount Jupiter is expected to pull from user_source_token_account

types.name: RouterConfig
docs: RouterConfig stores governance-controlled parameters that can be updated without redeploying the program

fields.name: max_venues_per_swap
docs: Maximum venues allowed per swap (compute guard). None = use default (3)

types.name: RouterState
docs: Router State Account - Global configuration and statistics

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update configuration

fields.name: pending_authority
docs: Pending authority for two-step transfer (security best practice)

fields.name: is_paused
docs: Whether the protocol is paused (circuit breaker)

fields.name: paused_at
docs: Timestamp when protocol was paused (for audit trail)

fields.name: rebate_percentage
docs: Percentage of NPI allocated to user rebates (basis points, 10000 = 100%)

fields.name: treasury_percentage
docs: Percentage of NPI allocated to treasury (basis points, 10000 = 100%)

fields.name: boost_vault_percentage
docs: Percentage of NPI allocated to boost vault (basis points, 10000 = 100%)

fields.name: treasury_from_fees_bps
docs: Percentage of platform fees allocated to treasury (basis points, 10000 = 100%)

fields.name: buyburn_from_fees_bps
docs: Percentage of platform fees allocated to buy & burn (basis points, 10000 = 100%)

fields.name: treasury_wallet
docs: Treasury wallet collecting platform fees and NPI share

fields.name: boost_vault_wallet
docs: Boost vault wallet accumulating lock rewards

fields.name: buyback_wallet
docs: Buy & burn wallet receiving platform fee allocation

fields.name: npi_vault_wallet
docs: Vault used to custody NPI reserves if needed

fields.name: total_volume
docs: Total volume of swaps processed (in USDC/lamports)

fields.name: total_npi
docs: Total Net Positive Income generated

fields.name: total_rebates_paid
docs: Total rebates paid to users

fields.name: total_treasury_from_npi
docs: Total treasury share sourced from NPI

fields.name: total_boost_vault
docs: Total boost vault allocation accumulated

fields.name: dynamic_slippage_enabled
docs: Enable dynamic slippage calculation based on volatility

fields.name: total_treasury_from_fees
docs: Total treasury share sourced from platform fees

fields.name: total_buyburn
docs: Total buy & burn allocation sourced from platform fees

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: jupiter_swap_ix_data
docs: Jupiter instruction data for CPI replay (provided by keeper/SDK)

fields.name: liquidity_estimate
docs: Liquidity estimate provided by off-chain services

fields.name: volatility_bps
docs: Volatility estimate in BPS (0..=5000, where 100 = 1%)

fields.name: min_venue_score
docs: Minimum venue quality score threshold (excludes venues below this)

fields.name: slippage_per_venue
docs: Per-venue slippage overrides (allows user to set max slippage per DEX)

fields.name: token_a_decimals
docs: Token A decimals (for accurate TVL calculation, default: 6)

fields.name: token_b_decimals
docs: Token B decimals (for accurate TVL calculation, default: 6)

fields.name: max_staleness_override
docs: Max staleness override in seconds (for volatile markets, use 30-60s instead of default 300s)
Must be between MIN_STALENESS_SECS and MAX_STALENESS_SECS

fields.name: jito_bundle
docs: Jito bundle configuration for MEV protection
When enabled, transaction is sent via Jito's private mempool

types.name: UserRebate
docs: User Rebate Tracking Account

fields.name: user
docs: User who owns this rebate account

fields.name: unclaimed_rebate
docs: Unclaimed USDC rebates (in lamports)

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total USDC claimed historically

fields.name: total_swaps
docs: Number of swaps completed

fields.name: last_swap_timestamp
docs: Last swap timestamp

fields.name: last_claim_timestamp
docs: Last claim timestamp

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: VenueSlippage
docs: Per-venue slippage configuration

types.name: VenueType
docs: Enumeration of all supported DEX venues for native routing
Each venue can generate NPI (Native Price Improvement) rebates
